item.title: Wewp. Shmall probbz, anyone spare a sec? plawkz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Looks bad but hey

					case 9154: //LogOUT KAI?
		if(inCombat) {
			sendMessage("You cannot loggout during combat!");
}
		else if(!inCombat) {
						Boolean = true;
						Boolean = true;
						Method();
						Method();
						Method();
						Method();
}

Those methods();
and Boolean = true; are diff, just dont want to show.

Now, when someone is attacking me, i can still loggout, anyone know how i can fix this?

Read full topic
